title: Osho_From Bondage to Freedom (43 videos)
description:
From Bondage to Freedom
 
Answers to the Seekers on the Path
Talks given from 15/09/85 am to 27/10/85 am
English Discourse series
43 Chapters
Year published: 1985
Original title "The Rajneesh Bible Volume 8".(1-25) 
The last 17 discourses were originally titled "The Rajneesh Bible Volume 9".
Video From Bondage to freedom #43, is original an old non edited from The Rajneesh Bible vol 9 #17..

Title "The Rajneesh Bible" was changed 1991 and 8 new volumes with new names was created.One of them is series "From Bondage to Freedom". read more info on Sannyas Wiki.

      Osho:  Vivek was just asking me, "Why are your discourses called `The Rajneesh Bible'?" 
        They are called "The Bible" just to make it clear to the whole world the "bible" simply means the book, it does not mean the holy book. That's why you say "bibliography". Is there anything holy in a bibliography? A bibliography simply means a list of books. It is really just "the book", and I want it to be clear to the whole world that a bible has nothing to do with holiness. 
        (Osho, From Darkness to Light, Ch.13, 13 Mar 1985) 

    The series contains twelve volumes of which only the first four were ever published under the name Rajneesh Bible. 

Audios and books can be downloadd free from oshoworld(dot)com where most of Osho talks,are not edited as many of the new editions on osho(dot)com
